name: Avoid Methods and Functions having recursive calls (PHP)
description: This quality rule retrieves all functions and methods that are recursive in nature.
output:
This report lists all methods and functions having recursive calls.
This QR provides the following information:
Method or Function full name
rationale: Recursive calls can be unpredictable with regard to memory consumption, takes more time than iterative. It may cause stack-overflow if recursion goes deep to solve problem. It is very difficult to debug and trace the values with each step of recursion
remediation: Review the source code to reduce the number of methods and function with recursive call
remediationSample:
<?php
function iterative_global($a) {
   for($a;$a < 4;$a++)
   {
      echo "$a \n" ;                            //violation removed
   }
}
class CastTest {
   public function iterative($b) {
      for($b;$b <7;$b++) {
        echo "$b \n" ;                            //violation removed
      }
   }
}
$test =  new CastTest();
$test->iterative(4);
iterative_global(1);
?>
sample:
<?php
function recursive_global($a) {
   if($a < 4) {
      echo "$a \n";
      recursive_global($a +1);                       //violation
   }
}   
class CastTest {
   public function recursive($b) {
      if($b < 7) {
         echo "$b \n";
         $this->recursive($b +1);                  //violation
      }
   }
}
$test =  new CastTest();
$test->recursive(4);
recursive_global(1);
?>
